name: AE Form, Reproductive system and breast disorders
AE Form, Renal and urinary disorders
AE Form, Adverse event related to any TB drug
shortname: Is this adverse event related to any of the TB drugs in the patient's regimen?

name: AE Form, List of potentially related TB drugs for AE
shortname: If yes, potentially related to TB drug(s)

name: AE Form, Non-TB drug factors
shortname: Are there any other causal factors, such co-morbidities, procedures, other non-TB drugs, etc?

name: AE Form, Outcome of the AE
AE Form, Final changes to the TB treatment due to the AE
shortname: Final changes to the TB treatment regimen due to this AE
answer.1: No changes made to the TB treatment regimen
answer.2: One or more TB drugs were temporarily dose reduced
answer.3: One or more TB drugs were permanently dose reduced
answer.4: One or more TB drugs were temporarily interrupted
answer.5: One or more TB drugs were permanently discontinued
